title: Game of thrones
body:
Season 01 episode 02

Ned said au revoir to Jon snow promising to tell him all about his mother the next time he sees him.

Season 08

Jon will hear his truth from Sam and/or Bran in the crypts in the presence of Ned Stark’s tomb.

blog.name: theredkingofthenorth
blog.title: Robb Stark
blog.description: Private. 21. Majoring in World History. Teacher aide in Phys education. Part of everlyhqs.

summary: @hvddenpcssions Jon Robb felt a bit anxious meeting his brother at a bar in New York City. The city didn’t feel like home to him...
body:
@hvddenpcssions Jon

Robb felt a bit anxious meeting his brother at a bar in New York City. The city didn’t feel like home to him and the last he had seen his sibling, he was heading off to the wall. Now, there were only jails that worked like that. He fiddled with his drink, noting that the girl who served it to him was definitely attractive and attentive. She felt easy to converse with as he waited for his family member to arrive and when he finally spotted the familiar black curls, he brightened up, popping off his seat instantly. “Jon!” He called, definitely getting a few looks from the other people that were around him. “Jon! Right here!” He said as he motioned for him to come closer. “Hey,” he spoke as the other came to him, pulling him into a tight embrace for a moment. “It’s good to see you. I hope this seat is okay, Donna said she would take care of both of us for the night.”

body:
So…

I want Sansa to fight. I want her to take that badass energy and fight in the battle. It feels unlikely because that’s not something she’s ever done or learned to do, but I think it would be so cool to see her with a sword or something.

tags: nothing can be labeled ‘canon’ until it airs on hbo
let people theorize to their heart’s content
it’s all part of the fun!
summary:
Stephen: “Did you know how the series ended before you got to the end?...before you guys shot the final [season]?” 
Kit: “I had...
body:
Stephen: “Did you know how the series ended before you got to the end?…before you guys shot the final [season]?”

Kit: “I had my theories. I had, like, I’ve had theories all along and all of them were wrong.”

This interview was fun to watch! Kit’s words here stuck out to me. They sound like a truthful response and in the context of the interview makes me believe his response is genuine.

This makes me think that widely believed theoretical endings will not end up happening—at least not the way the audience expects it to. Twists and turns will still happen.

I think we are all aware that the Night King plotline, in general terms of inter-character conflict, is cut and dry.

  • No living character wants the Night King to win. Cersei doesn’t. Dany doesn’t. The Starks definitely don’t. No one wants to turn into an ice zombie.

Then, where does all this surprise and mystery about the season come from?

  • It cannot come simply from this or that character dying. Since season one we know that no character is truly safe. Then, what is left but the relationships between those who are living?
  • The Lannister, Stark, and Targaryen factions will have conflict. Amongst themselves and between each faction. They have to. Each character has different goals.

Until the season ends we are all just guessing and theorizing.

  • If even Kit and Rose couldn’t guess the ending we shouldn’t be so sure of popular theories that everyone and their mother already claim to be ‘canon’.
  • In the end we’re all just fans of a show trying to figure out how it’ll end.

(Or maybe we’ve all known the ending for years and Kit is just trolling lmao. But that’d be disappointing after a two years wait 🤷🏻‍♀️)

summary: Til Death Do Us Part... - Wedding Day 11 (on Wattpad) https://my.w.tt/uH78fKK3RU  Ilva the Winter had always imagined her...
caption:
Til Death Do Us Part… - Wedding Day 11 (on Wattpad) https://my.w.tt/uH78fKK3RU 

Ilva the Winter had always imagined her wedding day to be the most beautiful day of her life. And even though she loves Jon Snow more than anything else in the world, she can’t help missing the man she had planned this wedding with. But Robb Stark died on a battlefield far away from home and Ilva can only hope that he’s proud of her now. Ilva can only hope that he’s proud of her and Jon now. 

*A modern Game of Thrones fanfiction with a female OC describing the wedding day and Ilva’s life with Robb and with Jon*

And even though she loves Jon Snow more than anything else in the world, she can’t help missing the man she had planned this wedding with. But Robb Stark died on a battlefield far away from home and Ilva can only hope that he’s proud of her now. Ilva can only hope that he’s proud of her and Jon now. 

*A modern Game of Thrones fanfiction with a female OC describing the wedding day and Ilva’s life with Robb and with Jon*
trail.content:
Til Death Do Us Part… - Wedding Day 11 (on Wattpad) https://my.w.tt/uH78fKK3RU 

Ilva the Winter had always imagined her wedding day to be the most beautiful day of her life. And even though she loves Jon Snow more than anything else in the world, she can’t help missing the man she had planned this wedding with. But Robb Stark died on a battlefield far away from home and Ilva can only hope that he’s proud of her now. Ilva can only hope that he’s proud of her and Jon now. 

*A modern Game of Thrones fanfiction with a female OC describing the wedding day and Ilva’s life with Robb and with Jon*

summary:
Have we decided whether is this from S7 or S8? 
Looking at the marks on the ground it is Jon that is approaching Dany (because...
body:
Have we decided whether is this from S7 or S8?

Looking at the marks on the ground it is Jon that is approaching Dany (because the other standing mark further away). And I don’t think we’ve seen Jon being so close to Dany in outside environment (it might be snow on the ground?).

If it is from s8 it’s not from first episode since we see Dany with her white fur for outside shots, that’s why I’m confused 🤷‍♀️
